project1.title: Stock Viewer
project1.summary: A React and Node.js based platform offering near real-time data for major indices, market news, and trending stocks.

project2.title: Spotify Wrap
project2.summary: A React website using Spotify's API to display user's top tracks, artists, and genres, while also giving some analytics on their listening habits.

project3.title: Traffic Accident Analytics
project3.summary: A website that analyzes 7.7 million U.S. traffic accidents (2016-2022) with graphs highlighting accident-prone areas and visibility levels. Users can search for specific accidents and access detailed information about that accident.

project4.title: Weatherio
project4.summary: A simple/modern weather app that uses plain HTML,CSS, and JavaScript. Utilizing two different weather APIs and a geolocation API to provide the user with the most accurate weather information.
